name: Huginn's Trials
description:
Huggin's Trials is a 2D multiplayer platformer. Play as the Bear, Wolf, Deer or Boar clan leader and be the first to reach the end rune in each challenging level to get the most points.

 
CONTROLS : 

- Joystick to choose your angle 

- Hold and release A to jump 

- You can jump in the air
